---
title: "Variation SNPs Analysis"
output: html_document
---

```{r load packages}
library("ggplot2")
```


# load in data
```{r load-data}
data <- read.csv("data/Dataset_S1.txt")
# View data
head(data)
```

# plot data
```{r plot-gc}
colnames(data)[12] <- "percent.GC"

data$GC.binned <- cut(data$percent.GC, 5)

ggplot(data) + geom_bar(aes(x = GC.binned))
```
